{{Rewrite}} {{film infobox | image = Diari dalla terza Era - poster.jpeg | caption = | name = Diari dalla Terza Era | director = Claudio Ripalti | producer = Claudio Ripalti | writer = '''Novel:'''
[[J.R.R. Tolkien]]
'''Screenplay:'''
Claudio Ripalti
| narrator = | starring = Alessandro Gabbianelli, Gualtiero Stipa, Alessandro Renz | music = Enrico Ripalt | cinematography = Mike Ritchie, Stein Stie | editing = Elena Cancellieri | distributor = | released = July 5, 2013 | runtime = 17:42 | country = Italy | language = Italian | budget = 1,400 euros | website = [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3CGbVn2ffHA website] | imdb_id = 1323925 }}'''Diari dalla Terza Era''' (Italian: '''Third Age Journals''') is a [[:Category:Fan films|fan film]] that was made released in July 2013. The film can be downloaded online for free. ==Synopsis== {{Expansion}} Diari dalla Terza Era takes place between the events of [[The Lord of the Rings]] and [[The Silmarillion]] specifically in {{TA|1975}} during the fall of Kingdom of [[Angmar]]. The film follows a [[Men|Man]] known as "Il Campione" (Italian:The Champion) who pursues the [[Witch-King|Witch-King of Angmar]] despite [[Glorfindel]]'s prophecy which states: {{Blockquote|He will not return to this land. Far off yet is his doom, and not by the hand of man will he fall.|Glorfindel, ''[[The Return of the King]]'', [[Appendix A]] (iv)}} ==Production== Diari dalla Terza Era is based on [[The Lord of the Rings]] and [[The Silmarillion]], specifically the chapter [[Of the Rings of Power and the Third Age]]. It was an independent, non-profit production shot in April and May 2013 with a budget of 1,400 euros.{{webcite|author=Robert Arduini|articleurl=https://www.jrrtolkien.it/fandom/cinema/film-diari-dalla-terza-era/|articlename=Film: Diari dalla Terza Era|dated=24 July 2013|website=[https://www.jrrtolkien.it/ jrrtolkien.it]|accessed=29 January 2024}} Filming took place in The Castle of Piandimeleto, Monte Catria, Monte Acuto, Parco di Cesane in Urbino and Gola del Furlo.{{webcite|author=Aragorn II|articleurl=https://elanillounico.com/noticias/peliculas/diari-dalla-terza-era-fanfilm-italiano-inspirado-en-el-senor-de-los-anillos/|articlename=Diari dalla Terza Era, fanfilm italiano inspirado en El Señor de los Anillos|dated=13 November|website=[https://elanillounico.com/ elanillounico.com]|accessed=29 January 2024}} ==Cast== ==Crew== Directed by: Claudio Ripalti.
Written by: Claudio Ripalti and Daniela Cancellieri.
Screenplay by: Claudio Ripalti, Daniela Cancellieri.
Producer: Claudio Ripalti, Daniela Cancellieri.
Costumes by: Daniela Cancellieri.
Casting: Daniela Cancellieri with Alessandro Gabbianelli and Gualtiero Stipa.
Music by: Enrico Ripalti (Based on music by [[Howard Shore]]). {{References}} ==External links== *[http://tolkienbrasil.com/videos/fanmade/fan-filme-diario-da-terceira-era/ Diari dalla terza Era] at [http://www.tolkienbrasil.com TolkienBrasil] {{Fan films}} [[Category:Fan films|Diari dalla terza Era]]
